string-array.name: script_create_terremotos
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE [TERREMOTOS] ([id] INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,[TITULO] VARCHAR(100) NULL,[LINK] VARCHAR(2000) NULL,[FECHA] TIMESTAMP NULL,[MAGNITUD] FLOAT NULL,[LATITUD] FLOAT NULL,[LONGITUD] FLOAT NULL)

string-array.name: script_create_terremotos_upgrade_v2
string-array.item: alter table terremoto add column link varchar2 ;

string-array.name: script_create_terremotos_upgrade_v3
string-array.item: alter table terremoto add column extra varchar2 ;
